sentences.en: After a shower, he put on his overalls as a dustman.
sentences.cn: 冲完淋浴, 他穿上了清洁工的工作服.

sentences.en: He started out as a Dublin dustman and became one of the founding fathers of the resurgence of the Temple Bar district of the capital.
sentences.cn: 他从都柏林的一个清洁工做起，成为了首都圣殿酒吧区复兴的奠基人之一。

sentences.en: He then changed into overalls and spent the next eight hours as a dustman.
sentences.cn: 然后他换上工装裤,作为清洁工人度过接下去的八小时.

sentences.en: He then changed into overalls and spent the next eight hours as dustman.
sentences.cn: 然后换上工作服,当八个小时的清洁工.

sentences.en: He was born of a working - class family. His father was a humble dustman, one of Nature's gentlemen.
sentences.cn: 他出身于 工人阶级 家庭. 他爸爸是个地位低下的清洁工人, 对人客客气气,遇事替人着想.
他是我们学校的清洁工人.

sentences.en: Mr Brown is a dustman while his wife is a professor.
sentences.cn: 布朗先生是位清洁工而他的妻了是一位教授.

sentences.en: That's not a very pleasant job, why do you want to become a dustman?
sentences.cn: 他妈妈吃惊的问他,“那不是一份体面的工作, 你为啥想做清洁工阿? ”

sentences.en: The old dustman has been working on this street for twenty years.
sentences.cn: 这个老清洁工达条街上干了20年了。

sentences.en: You shouldn't look down upon him just because he is a dustman.
sentences.cn: 你不应该因为他是个清洁工就轻视他.

trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to remove waste from  dustbin s
